Interface RewardService

    public interface RewardService

    • Method Detail

      • reedemReward

        org.json.simple.JSONObject reedemReward(int ptyid,
                                      int rwdid)
                                        throws NoSufficientGainedPointsException
        This method used to validate the voucher code.
        Parameters:
        ptyid - an unique id of party id.
        rwdid - an unique id of reward id.
        Returns:
        returns JSONObject that has a value of success message.
        Throws:
        NoSufficientGainedPointsException - Exception thrown when there is no sufficient gained point while redeeming reward.

      • getRewardListing

        org.json.simple.JSONArray getRewardListing(int pageno,
                                         int pagesize)
        This method used to get all reward listing from database.
        Parameters:
        pageno - current page number.
        pagesize - total number of records shown in current page.
        Returns:
        returns JSONArray contains all the reward listing.

      • getRewardDetail

        org.json.simple.JSONObject getRewardDetail(int rewardid)
        This method used to get reward detail from database based on reward id passed.
        Parameters:
        rewardid - the primary key of reward element.
        Returns:
        returns JSONObject which contains whole details of reward element.

      • isRewardExist

        boolean isRewardExist(int rewardid)
        It is used to check whether reward already exist in database or not. It will return true or false message.
        Parameters:
        rewardid - an unique id of reward element.
        Returns:
        return boolean true or false.

      • saveReward

        org.json.simple.JSONObject saveReward(int rwdId,
                                    java.lang.String rwdName,
                                    java.lang.String rwdDesc,
                                    java.lang.String rwdImg,
                                    int rwdPoints,
                                    java.lang.String rwdExpDate,
                                    int rwdStdid,
                                    java.lang.String rwdStatus)
                                      throws java.text.ParseException
        Parameters:
        rwdId - the primary key of reward.
        rwdName - name of the reward.
        rwdDesc - reward description.
        rwdImg - reward image.
        rwdPoints - reward points.
        rwdExpDate - reward expiry date.
        rwdStdid - an unique id of studio.
        rwdStatus - reward status.
        Returns:
        returns JSONObject that has a value of reward id.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - Exception thrown when we try to parsing.

      • rewardSearch

        org.json.simple.JSONArray rewardSearch(java.lang.String rwdname,
                                     int stdid,
                                     java.lang.String type)
        This method used to get all the rewards from database and helps to search the rewards based on reward name, studio id, type of reward.
        Parameters:
        rwdname - name of the reward.
        stdid - an unique id of the studio.
        type - type of reward current / expired reward.
        Returns:
        returns JSONArray contains all the results after searching is done.
